jobFunction: Administrative, Customer Service, and Human Resources
industry: Insurance and Hospitals and Health Care
description:
POSITION: HR Service Center Representative - Sr(Help Desk) LOCATION: Pasadena CA 91188 (Remote- local to Pasadena) DURATION: 6+ months, with potential to extend. Pay: $24/hr on W2


Top Three things Worker will be doing: Answering phones, answering Chats, answering helpdesk items(emails)

Top Three Skillsets needed: Customer Service, Patient and High capacity


- some HR experience such HR generalist, HR customer service. - should have heavy phone experience. -they get calls from internal employees and they need to register these issues. - Bachelors is a requirement.



o Parking Situation: Parking Structure o Dress Code: Business Casual • Required Level of Education: Required BA/BS • How many years of related experience are you looking for in your ideal candidate? 2-4 years • Specific Systems Knowledge Required: Outlook, Oracle, Salesforce • Specific Systems Knowledge Preferred: Outlook, Oracle, Salesforce, Taleo, Cisco • Expected Shift: 8:30am-5:30pm • Interview Process: Initial Interview: Phone call with hiring manager 2nd interview: Microsoft Teams (camera on) Panel Interview
